comments:
Looks similar to the problem reported in 49788.  I will attach a patch.  The 
problem is that some items in this method may have null ids.  We need to check 
for this case.

patch to fix this bug
Thanks.
I am using 3.0M7 build on Solaris 8 to perform regression testing. I created 2 
new projects. When I right click on the projects in the Navigation view, the 
eclipse crashes. The following is the hs_err log:

An unexpected exception has been detected in native code outside the VM.

Currently, every time I try to restart eclipse, it crashes.
This is unrelated to the original problem here.  I've filed this as bug 53701.

For the original problem, I've added 2 null checks to findAlphabeticalOrder.
